name: Samyam Dhamala
headline: Data & QA Engineer • MS Information Science (UNH) • Python · SQL · QA Automation
about: Analytical and technically skilled professional with 2+ years across data validation, software QA, and visualization. Experienced with Python, SQL, Power BI, Tableau, and test automation tools like Cypress and Postman. Comfortable communicating insights, collaborating across Agile teams, and improving product quality and decision‑making.
